sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useScrollPosition } from '@n8tb1t/use-scroll-position' const Nav = ({}) => { const [hideOnScroll, setHideOnScroll] = useState(true) useScrollPosition(({ prevPos, currPos }) => { const isShow = currPos.y > prevPos.y if (isShow !== hideOnScroll) setHideOnScroll(isShow) }, [hideOnScroll]) return (
SPM Analyzer
Home
Features
Gallery
SPM Estimator
Contact
Download
) } export default Nav
